summary: Wholesale and retail shop management application
architectural_notes: Currency formatting should use Ghana Cedis (GH₵) throughout the application

existing_features.title: Create a product inventory management system that allows adding, editing, viewing, and deleting products with fields for product name, SKU, category, wholesale price, retail price, quantity in stock, and description

Implement a sales transaction system that records sales with customer type (wholesale or retail), products sold, quantities, applicable pricing (wholesale or retail), transaction date, and total amount
Create a dashboard that displays key business metrics including total inventory value, recent transactions, low stock alerts (products below a threshold), and sales summaries
Display 'Eleazar Jireh Enterprise' as the shop name prominently in the application header and branding throughout the interface

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, professional colors (such as earth tones or warm neutrals with accent colors), clear typography optimized for business data readability, and a clean layout that prioritizes efficiency and quick access to inventory and sales functions

Change all currency displays from the current format to Ghana Cedis (GH₵) including product prices (wholesale and retail), sales transaction amounts, dashboard metrics (total inventory value, sales totals), and any other monetary values shown in the application

new_feature_requests.summary: Create wholesale and retail shop management system
Change currency display to Ghana Cedis (GH₵)

Replace the current color scheme in frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css with the user-provided color codes throughout the application theme including backgrounds, borders, text colors, and accent colors
